backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, questions (with text/image options, subjects, class levels), full syllabus tests with two sections, test attempts with section-wise answers and scores, and access control integration with admin/user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features for ResultPage.tsx including fetching test attempt data, displaying score summaries with performance indicators, showing section-wise statistics, and implementing question review with correct/incorrect answer highlighting.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, components (Layout, Navbar, Footer), pages (LandingPage, StudentDashboard, AdminDashboard, TestInterface, ResultPage, Leaderboard), hooks for queries and mutations, and styling configurations.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for Concept Delta's navy blue theme, including background, foreground, primary, secondary, and UI component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, SEO description for Concept Delta MHT-CET platform, and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up QueryClient for React Query and RouterProvider with TanStack Router configuration and type declarations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding with delta symbol, quick links to home/dashboard/YouTube, social media handle, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component that renders Navbar, main content area with Outlet for nested routes, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Concept Delta branding, responsive mobile menu toggle, conditional rendering of Dashboard/Admin links for authenticated users, and Internet Identity login/logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: Provides React Query mutations for creating full syllabus tests and assigning questions to tests, with automatic cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using @dfinity/auth-client, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, questions, user profiles, and test attempts from the backend actor with proper loading and enabled states.
Exports a mutation hook for creating questions with text/image content, multiple choice options, correct answer, explanation, subject, and class level, invalidating question queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: Provides mutations for starting and submitting test sections with answers, invalidating test attempt queries on success and logging errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, plus responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for analytics, test management, question gallery, and user management, showing placeholder stat cards and redirecting unauthenticated users to home.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests with two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths), allowing selection of questions for each section and assignment to a named test.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin page for creating individual questions with text/image content, four options (each with text/image), correct answer selection, explanation, subject classification, and class level.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showcasing MHT-CET mock test platform features, YouTube subscription requirement, Telegram community link, and call-to-action for user login/registration.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Placeholder leaderboard page that displays test ID and indicates future implementation with backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Displays detailed test attempt results including section-wise scores, time taken, percentage, and statistics after test completion.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard showing available active tests with the ability to start a test attempt, creating a new attempt record and navigating to the test interface.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: React component for the test-taking interface with timer, question navigation, answer selection via radio buttons, section transitions, and auto-submit functionality. Handles both sections of full syllabus tests with 90-minute timers and manages test attempt state.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree with root layout and child routes for landing page, student/admin dashboards, question/test creation, test interface, results, and leaderboard pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for parameters like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme for borders/shadows/animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining the MHT-CET mock test platform 'Concept Delta' with architectural notes, feature list, known issues, and technical specifications including Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity auth, and test types.
